slide.title: PHP 5.3 - Namespaces
slide.example:
<?php
// foo.php
namespace foo;

class bar {
  function __construct() {
    echo get_called_class();
  }
}
?>

<?php
require './foo.php';
use foo\bar as b;
$a = new b;
?>

<?php
namespace Foo;
class Bar {
    public function Bar() {
        // treated as constructor in PHP 5.3.0-5.3.2
        // treated as regular method in PHP 5.3.3
    }
}
?>
